headline: Plandemic Lies 6 Months Later
author: Trevor Thomas
sentences:
Comments:
Years from now when this is all behind us, this is the stuff we'll remember most, and what people will be talking about regarding COVID.
The vaxxed can become superspreaders like Typhoid Mary, because they are equally or more infectious, but with suppressed symptoms.
Boosters are required, because the vaccine provides some protection for only a few months and only against a specific variant.
The vaxxed are as infectious as the naive unvaccinated and significantly more infectious than recovered unvaccinated.
The vaccinated can’t spread COVID (“Get vaccinated to protect grandma”) ?
After getting fully vaccinated, you’ll be done for good ?
The vaccines are 95% effective at preventing infection ?
